doc.name: ExceptionManager
doc.description: The ExceptionManager catches exceptions and attempts to handle them with the specified policy. It notifies ExceptionSubscribers after an exception has occurred and again after the handling attempt. If the exception cannot be handled, the model Manager is informed.
doc.author: Elizabeth Latronico
doc.property: The exception message from the caught exception.
The error handling policy to apply if an exception occurs. One of: restart, stop, throw. See ptolemy.actor.lib.CatchExceptionAttribute
The latest action, if any, taken by the CatchExceptionAttribute. For example, a notification that the model has restarted. It offers a way to provide feedback to the user.
